name: Appartements Sandhofer
description: Directly in the center of Mayrhofen you'll find our house. Just park you vehicle and are right in your holiday paradise. If summer or winter - everything is near by. (Cable Car, Adventure Pool, Nightlife, Supermarket etc.)

Inclusive: Tax, Heating, Electricity, Water, Baby Bed and other toys or stuff for your children, Towels for dishes, bed etc.
Exclusice: Cleaning Fee at the end of your stay

Check in / Check out: to be prearranged with owners.
A12 Autobahn, Take off Zillertal, B169 County Road, Entrance Mayrhofen Mitte, pass the Post Office and the upcoming Cross Road, take the first street on your right and after 100m you are right in front of our house.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Kitchen with Tv, microwave, washing machine, sofa, 2 doublebedrooms, extra bed possible

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Kitchen with microwace, coffe machine etc., living room with Tv, 3 bedroom  2 single bedrooms, bath with shower and tube
